title: Cyber SecuritySyllabus

metadata.description: Learn about Cyber SecuritySyllabus with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Introduction
The
 Cyber Security Tutorial
is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.
It will give you a fundamental knowledge of cyber security principles and practices.
It is designed for beginners and requires basic computer and networking knowledge.
The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.
The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.
The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn cyber security step by step, from basic concepts to advanced security practices.
Get Started With Cyber Security »
Learning Outcomes
Learn what cyber crime is and why it is important.
Understand basic networking and the OSI model.
Learn about common network attacks.
Understand web application attacks and vulnerabilities.
Learn the basics of security operations and defense strategies.
Note:
Are you a teacher teaching Cyber Security?
 Academy
is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about
Academy here
.
Which Subjects Are Cyber Security Relevant For?
Network Security:
Protecting networks from unauthorized access.
Application Security:
Securing software applications from threats.
Information Security:
Protecting sensitive data and systems.
Cloud Security:
Securing cloud-based resources and services.
Incident Response:
Handling and managing security incidents.
Risk Management:
Assessing and managing security risks.
Compliance:
Meeting security regulations and standards.
Get Started
Activities
In this tutorial we offer different activities for you to learn Cyber Security for free:
Lessons
Quizzes
Sign in to Track Progress
You can also create a free account to 
As a signed-in user, you get access to features such as:
Learning paths
Sandbox and lab environments
Achievements
And much more!

Overview of the Modules
CS HOME
CS Cyber Crime
CS Money Making Threats
CS Dark Web
CS Networking Basics
CS Network Layer
CS Network Transport
CS Firewalls
CS Web Applications
CS Mapping & Port Scanning
CS Network Attacks
CS Web Application Attacks
CS WIFI Attacks
CS Passwords
CS Penetration Testing & Social Engineering
CS Security Operations
CS Incident Response
Get Started
Sandbox and Lab Environment
Cyber Security, like any technical field, is best learned through hands-on practice.
If you want to explore more and host your project, we have a feature called
Spaces
that allows you to practice basic security concepts for free.
Here you get a secure sandbox environment called Spaces, where you can practice security techniques and test security tools in real-time.
Spaces allow you to test, analyze, and implement security measures. This includes a  subdomain, hosting, and secure SSL certificates.
Spaces require no installation and run directly in the browser.
Features include:
Collaboration
File navigator
Terminal & log
Package manager
Database
Environment manager
Analytics
Create a Spaces Account
Cyber Security Certification
 offers an end-of-pathway certification program.
Here you can take exams to get certified.
The Cyber Security exam is a test that summarizes the  Cyber Security syllabus.
After passing the exam you get the "Certified Cyber Security Professional" Certification.
There are two different types of certifications:
Non-adaptive
Adaptive
The non-adaptive is pass or no pass.
The adaptive certification is adaptive and graded; students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.
Buy Certificate »
Are You a Teacher?
Are you interested in learning how you can use
 Academy
to Teach 
Cyber Security?
Watch a demo of
 Academy
. You'll see how it works, and discover how it can make teaching programming easier and more engaging.
Watch Demo »

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers Cyber SecuritySyllabus concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Cyber SecuritySyllabus effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Cyber SecuritySyllabus and how to apply it in your projects.
